categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Peter Sumner (January 29, 1942–November 22, 2016) was an Australian actor who portrayed Lieutenant Pol Treidum and operated the dianoga of garbage masher 3263827 in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
In 1999, he appeared in an Australian Star Wars fan film titled The Dark Redemption.
